channel.title: (PI) Need help on multiple issues
channel.description:
I don't feel like creating 30 new topics every time I need help with an individual issue, so I'm just going to list all the issues I need help with in this topic.
If you feel like helping please check back on this often as I will continue to edit it with my new problems. If not, please just don't even post :)
Problem 1: I'm trying to get items to permanently spawn in different spots in the world, and I can't quite figure out how to do that. Thanks to imsuperman05, I now know the code but am stumped as to where to place it. If anyone knows where to put this please do tell! [quote="imsuperman05, post:10, topic:414766"][code=java]Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, itemId, itemX, itemY, itemAmount, y);[/code][/quote]
Problem 2: I figured out how to remove objects, but when I remove a tall object, like a tree, the top of the trunk and the leaves still appear. It's like the object is on height 0 and height 1 and I can only remove height 0.
Problem 3: Dragon arrows (P++) weild in the weapon slot. I know, I know.. item.java, add item # under arrows, I did that; but for some reason it's still going in weapon slot. Any ideas?
Problem 4: coming soon -_-

item.title: (PI) Need help on multiple issues
item.dc:creator: @_Java6 `Java
item.description:
@_Java6 wrote:

I don’t feel like creating 30 new topics every time I need help with an individual issue, so I’m just going to list all the issues I need help with in this topic.

If you feel like helping please check back on this often as I will continue to edit it with my new problems.
If not, please just don’t even post

Problem 1: I’m trying to get items to permanently spawn in different spots in the world, and I can’t quite figure out how to do that. Thanks to imsuperman05, I now know the code but am stumped as to where to place it. If anyone knows where to put this please do tell!

GlobalSpawn help

Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, itemId, itemX, itemY, itemAmount, y);

Problem 2: I figured out how to remove objects, but when I remove a tall object, like a tree, the top of the trunk and the leaves still appear. It’s like the object is on height 0 and height 1 and I can only remove height 0.

Problem 3: Dragon arrows (P++) weild in the weapon slot.
I know, I know… item.java, add item # under arrows, I did that; but for some reason it’s still going in weapon slot. Any ideas?

Problem 4: coming soon -_-

Read full topic
